  % print the tabular information at the top of the card:

  % LaTeX-formatted description of the spell, generated from the HTML-formatted description_formatted column:
  You first cast the desired spell and then the \emph{permanency} spell.

  Depending on the spell, you must be of a minimum caster level and must
  expend a specific gp value of diamond dust as a material component.

  \bigskip
  Permanent spells on other targets are vulnerable to \emph{dispel magic}.\\
  Permanent spells on yourself can be dispelled only by a caster
  of higher level than you were when you cast the spell.

  \bigskip
  \emph{See full tables of spells that can be made permanent online}.\\
  The GM may allow other spells to be made permanent.
